# `bbva-notification-help`

## `Semantic Dom`

####   `DOM - Structure test`

```html
<bbva-notification-help>
</bbva-notification-help>

```

####   `SHADOW DOM - Structure test`

```html
<span
  class="accessible-hide"
  hidden=""
>
</span>
<cells-icon
  aria-hidden="true"
  class="icon-help"
  style="--cells-icon-size:1rem;"
>
</cells-icon>
<p class="text-help">
</p>

```
